types.html:
papillons dans le ventre m pl (plural only)

  1. butterflies in one's stomach (“fluttery” physical sensation in a person's stomach, due to nervousness and/or excitement, and often associated with love)
    avoir des papillons dans le ventre ― to have butterflies in one's stomach

title: papillons dans le ventre
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pa.pi.jɔ̃ dɑ̃ l(ə) vɑ̃tʁ/
